text: Sarah Catharine Paulson (born December 17, 1974) is an American actress. She was born in Tampa, Florida. She has won one Emmy Award, a Golden Globe Award and a Tony Award. Paulson played Maggie Corner in the "Family Values" episode of Law & Order. She played Anne Gillette in the episode "Shadow" of the same series. She played several characters in different seasons of American Horror Story. She played Dr. Caron in the movie Serenity. She also starred in The Post. Since early 2015, she has been in a relationship with actress Holland Taylor. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Tampa, Florida Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors. title: Sarah Paulson
